DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: to investigate the postoperative outcomes of Retrograde intrarenal surgery versus percutaneous nephrolithotomy in 2 to 4 cm kidney stones.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of RIRS Versus PCNL Methods, According to Postoperative Pain and Analgesic Demand in 2 to 4 cm Renal Stones
DOC.criteria: The patients who have 2 to 4 cm kidney stones ASA score within 1 to 3 Previous surgical treatment including SWL Congenital abnormalities
